section.name: APPLICATIONS
section.h3: Lucene can be used for a wide range of applications

section.name: Example Applications
section.p: Lucene is designed to be used in a wide range of applications--from small, desktop applications with a few hundred documents, to large internet server-based applications with a few million documents.

ul.li: Search large e-mail archives instantly; update index as new messages arrive.
Search large publications quickly with platform-independent system.
Relocate a page seen weeks or months ago.
Let users search all the pages on your website.
